lead_paragraph: TAMPA, Fla. - The Yankees have one responsibility Tuesday: be in street clothes by 10 a.m. That is when training camp turns into summer camp. Following the success of last year's surprise field trip to a pool hall, Manager Joe Girardi is instituting another mandatory day of fun, food and fellowship.
snippet: Following the success of last year's surprise field trip to a local pool hall, Yankees Manager Joe Girardi is instituting another mandatory day of fun, food and fellowship....

headline.main: From Training Camp to Summer Camp
